name: Bl0b B0y - A Fun 2D Portal Clone
name_original: Bl0b B0y - A Fun 2D Portal Clone
description:
This is a game i finished just before graduating high school.  It's pretty fun if I do say so myself, even if you decide you want to play to speedrun.

This is the most solid game I've ever made to date, yes there are a couple tiny bugs here and there that need touching up, but compared to the ones I made when I was little this is a masterpiece. There's a mechanic in this game I've had the idea for for ages and only just last year (2017) did I finally bring it to life: Directional Wall Portals in a 2D Portal Game; as far as I know I do believe i'm the only one to come up with it, "it just works" ~ Todd Howard.

I'm currently working on a game right now that should blow this one out of the water, so stay tuned, that is if you're interested.

I remember this taking me about 3 weeks to make, so I hope all that blood sweat and tears was worth it.

The song used for background music in the game is called "Twisted Light" by HOME

The game is free but donations are always happily accepted and appreciated.

That is all, enjoy and thanks for playing.
